mosais.image

Class ImageProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • mosais.image.ImageProcessor

  • public class ImageProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Redraws pixels in an image to apply effects. Handles loading and saving the image file.
    Author:
    Andrew Trismen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
      The image being modified
